item.description:
[b[i]]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND. OFTEN COPIED, NEVER DUPLICATED."

Saturday, FEBRUARY 6, at the new Holiday Inn Grand Ballroom,
4 Highwood Dr., Tewksbury. Rte. 133 off Rte. 93. (978)640-9000.
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by Award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvres, raffles, free door prizes, and MATCH GAME prizes.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES, 35-60 years old.

Cost is $12 all night.
Proper business dress required, sports jacket, or tie, for men highly recommended; business or party finery for women.
Co-sponsored by the Young Professionals Club and THE SINGLE CEO CLUB: www.singleceos.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Steve at the door.
item.name: "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" SINGLES DANCE
